contextId.information: This is a slight exaggeration as Hezekiah showed them many things, but not everything. Also, this can be expressed positively. AT: "Hezekiah showed them almost everything in his house and in his kingdom" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: There was nothing in his house, nor in all his kingdom, that Hezekiah did not show them

contextId.information: This can be expressed positively. AT: "I showed them all the valuable things in my palace" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: There is nothing among my valuable things that I have not shown them
